title: LOCL - Dynamic Business Analytics Exploration WebApp
description: Gift2Grow is a locally owned business that provides a number of services and applications to help business grow thier presence and market engagement. As the front-end lead for this project, I was responsible for building a fully functional dynamic React webapp. Features included authentication, account management, integration with a custom backend service, and a number of customizable analytic dashboards with data visualizations. I built the front-end using React, Redux, and Typescript, as well as an instance of Storybook to help organize and maintain a modular UI component library. I also helped integrate the service with third-party services including Facebook authentication and Stripe. I worked closely with the client and a freelance back-end developer to prioritize and roadmap feature developement, as well as identify technical solutions to business needs. Finally, I assisted in setting up hosting, DNS, and CI/CD integration through Github Actions.
deliverables: Custimizable analytic dashboards that showed a wide variety of business metrics include user engagement through services such as Google searches
Integration with third-party services include Stripe, Facebook, Google Analytics, and a custom Python based backend
Consultation on technical feasibility and prioritization of feature development
Development workflow standardization and integration of code quality tools including automated testing
